name: emi.arc-ce
description:
The A-REX is an ARC middleware component that implements functions of the so-called Computing Element

(CE). Here Computing Element is a service accepting requests containing a description of generic

computational jobs and executing it in the underlying local batch system.
releaseNotes:
What's new:



    * Feature:

          o 2591- Savannah task 21916: publish version information for ARC CE 

    * High priority bugs fixed:

          o 2280 - SRM transfer protocols are hard-coded

          o 2442 - ARC incompatible with CERN voms server

          o 2520 - GGUS-Ticket-ID: #72340 EMI1 ARC CE 1.0.0 wrong user mapping

          o 2565 - downloader fails if all the inputs are remote

          o 2579 - Transfer shares not using enough slot

          o 2236 - Uploaders hangs 



Deployment notes:



    * This release does not introduce any changes in the deployment procedures described in ARC CE documentation 



Known Issues



    * none
